org.accada.epcis.utils
Class QueryCallbackListener

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.accada.epcis.utils.QueryCallbackListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public final class QueryCallbackListener
extends java.lang.Thread

This class implements a simple web server listening for responses from the EPCIS Query Callback interface. The server is not multi-threaded, so it will only accept one request at a time. It will only allow one instance (singleton) and will be bound to a predefined port on localhost.

Author:
Marco Steybe
